positions.title: Associate Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developed a real-time web application enabling concurrent users to strategically combine jobs, reducing planned man-hours by nearly 30%
Engineered networking solutions to permit AWS services to interact with on-prem resources via an Application Load Balancer over a shared VPC origin
Designed an independent serverless file management service using AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and S3 with CloudFront to decouple file storage from a monolithic application
Led development on a new serverless order processing service for nested products using AWS Step Functions and AWS SQS
Optimized SQL query and Lambda execution performance for the order processing service, halving execution time while using 4 times less memory

positions.title: Intern, Software Engineer
responsibilities: Engineered an AWS Lambda function to address production memory constraints caused by Java ImageIO caching
Built an automated QR code generation service incorporated into work tickets, eliminating manual retrieval and reducing operational costs
Developed and executed Level 2 data passing for Braintree transaction requests, reducing transaction fees
Upgraded the existing checkout process by adding “Checkout with PayPal” utilizing the Braintree user vault

positions.title: Intern, Java Developer
responsibilities: Resolved a two-year-old production bug and upgraded two legacy production automations
Implemented a new JavaScript web scraping design that decreased execution time by up to 80%
Devised an automated task bot to validate a process with upwards of 17,000 daily transactions
Designed an alert that notified the team of low work volume, eliminating the need for 6 daily manual checks
Successfully developed production automation with 20% less execution time than estimated
Learned the software development pipeline, Agile workflow, and HelpDesk incident ticketing
